nodes.text: The second mission to Rodia was carried out by clone trooper Denal and his squad of clones. After a set of data concerning the Separatist secret superweapon was obtained on Tatooine, Denal was sent to Rodia to investigate further. Using the air support, he infiltrated the local Trade Federation base located in the Ancient Temple and stole another set of data. Denal then escaped with it before enemy reinforcements arrived.
